heading: David says, Israel’s help is in the name of the Lord.
verses: who was on our side, now may Israel say;
who was on our side, when men rose up against us:
us up quick, when their wrath was kindled against us:
Then the waters had overwhelmed us, the stream had gone over our soul:
Then the proud waters had gone over our soul.
Our soul is escaped as a bird out of the
of the fowlers: the snare is broken, and we are escaped.
